mapper.select: select * from post_table where post_id > #{startId} order by #{sort} limit 0, #{count};
mapper.insert: insert into post_table(uid, post_type, post_title, post_content, post_tag, view_times, post_date) values(#{uid},#{postType}, #{postTitle},#{postContent},#{postTag},#{viewTimes},#{postDate});
